item.title: Dr. Bob Sears Podcast- Segment #5
item.description: This segment brought to you by Sinupret for Kids www.sinupretforkids.com and Dr. Bob Sears, this segment of the podcast covers the topics of children’s dietary needs and whether or not to give children juice.
item.dc:creator: sarah conn
item.itunes:summary: This segment brought to you by Sinupret for Kids www.sinupretforkids.com and Dr. Bob Sears, this segment of the podcast covers the topics of children’s dietary needs and whether or not to give children juice.

item.title: Dr. Bob Sears Podcast – Segment #4
item.description: During this podcast with Dr. Bob Sears he answers questions about nose bleeds, what to do when your child gets lice, and the elimination diet. This segment is brought to you by Sinupret for Kids, learn more at www.sinupretforkids.com
item.dc:creator: sarah conn
item.itunes:summary: During this podcast with Dr. Bob Sears he answers questions about nose bleeds, what to do when your child gets lice, and the elimination diet. This segment is brought to you by Sinupret for Kids, learn more at www.sinupretforkids.com

item.title: Dr. Bob Sears Podcast – Segment #3
item.description: Dr. Bob Sears answers parents questions about vaccinations, how to deal with sibling rivalry, what to do when your child has repeat ear infections, and Sinupret for Kids. Dr. Bob Sears is a supporter of Sinupret for Kids and to learn more please visit www.sinupretforkids.com
item.dc:creator: sarah conn
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Bob Sears answers parents questions about vaccinations, how to deal with sibling rivalry, what to do when your child has repeat ear infections, and Sinupret for Kids. Dr. Bob Sears is a supporter of Sinupret for Kids and to learn more please visit www.sinupretforkids.com

item.title: Dr. Bob Sears Podcast- Segment #2
item.description: In this segment Dr. Sears answers parents questions about the link between asthma and allergies, gluten free diets, and finally what to do if your child has trouble sleeping through the night. This segment is brought to you by Sinupret for Kids www.sinupretforkids.com
item.dc:creator: sarah conn
item.itunes:summary: In this segment Dr. Sears answers parents questions about the link between asthma and allergies, gluten free diets, and finally what to do if your child has trouble sleeping through the night. This segment is brought to you by Sinupret for Kids www.sinupretforkids.com

item.title: Dr. Bob Sears Podcast- Segment #1
item.description: This segment with Dr. Bob Sears is brought to you by Sinupret for Kids, to learn more visit www.sinupretforkids.com . During this podcast Dr. Bob Sears will answer questions regarding aggression in children, how to best deal with developmental delays, and whether or not children need milk in their diets.
